audioText: Ma grand-mère raconte une histoire très amusante.
question: Ma grand-mère raconte une ______ très amusante.
explanation: The sentence means 'My grandmother tells a very funny story.' The word 'histoire' (story) fits perfectly in this context. Other options: 'chanson' (song), 'photo' (photo), 'recette' (recipe) don't make sense with the verb 'raconte' (tells/narrates).
